Package me.agno.gridjavacore.filtering

Class QueryStringFilterSettings

java.lang.Object
me.agno.gridjavacore.filtering.QueryStringFilterSettings
All Implemented Interfaces:
IGridFilterSettings
public class QueryStringFilterSettings extends Object implements IGridFilterSettings
The QueryStringFilterSettings class represents the settings for filtering data in a grid using query string parameters. It implements the IGridFilterSettings interface.

  • Field Details

    • DEFAULT_TYPE_QUERY_PARAMETER

      public static final String DEFAULT_TYPE_QUERY_PARAMETER
      The DEFAULT_TYPE_QUERY_PARAMETER variable represents the default query parameter name for filtering data in a grid. It is used to specify the type of filter to apply on the column. The value is set to "grid-filter". This variable is used in the QueryStringFilterSettings class to retrieve the filter query and filtered columns. It is also used in the DefaultFilterColumnCollection class to add and retrieve filter values by column.
      See Also:
      • IGridFilterSettings.getQuery()
      • getFilteredColumns()
      • DefaultFilterColumnCollection.add(String, GridFilterType, String)
      • DefaultFilterColumnCollection.getByColumn(IGridColumn)
      • Constant Field Values

    • DEFAULT_CLEAR_INIT_FILTER_QUERY_PARAMETER

      public static final String DEFAULT_CLEAR_INIT_FILTER_QUERY_PARAMETER
      The default value for the query parameter used to clear the initial filter in a grid. The value is set to "grid-clearinitfilter".
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Constructor Details

    • QueryStringFilterSettings

      public QueryStringFilterSettings(LinkedHashMap<String,List<String>> query)
      The QueryStringFilterSettings class represents the filter settings for a grid based on query string parameters. It takes a LinkedHashMap containing the query string parameters and initializes the filter settings accordingly. The filter settings are stored in the query field, which is a LinkedHashMap of string keys and list of string values. The filters are extracted from the query parameter with the key DEFAULT_TYPE_QUERY_PARAMETER. Each filter is parsed and converted into a ColumnFilterValue object, which is added to the filterValues list.
